detectors.description:
MoonbeamSale.startSale() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#156-159) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == owner && startDate == 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#157)
detectors.markdown:
[MoonbeamSale.startSale()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#L156-L159) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [require(bool)(msg.sender == owner && startDate == 0)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#L157)

detectors.description: MoonbeamSale.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#86-108) ignores return value by Token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#107)

MoonbeamSale.contribute() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#111-133) ignores return value by Token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#132)

MoonbeamSale.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#86-108) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startDate > 0 && now.sub(startDate) <= 604800) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#87)
	- now.sub(startDate) <= 86400 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#92)
	- now.sub(startDate) > 86400 && now.sub(startDate) <= 172800 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#94)
	- now.sub(startDate) > 172800 && now.sub(startDate) <= 259200 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#96)
	- now.sub(startDate) > 259200 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#98)
detectors.markdown:
[MoonbeamSale.receive()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#L86-L108) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [require(bool)(startDate > 0 && now.sub(startDate) <= 604800)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#L87)
	- [now.sub(startDate) <= 86400](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#L92)
	- [now.sub(startDate) > 86400 && now.sub(startDate) <= 172800](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#L94)
	- [now.sub(startDate) > 172800 && now.sub(startDate) <= 259200](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#L96)
	- [now.sub(startDate) > 259200](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#L98)

Variable MoonbeamSale.Token (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonbeamSale.sol#72) is not in mixedCase
